answers.answer: Hi..May I ask at what are you were diagnosed? I am 42 this month and was diagnosed with PTC. Had a TT with central compartment dissection for a 1.4cm left thyroid nodule. I had 9 out of 12 lymph nodes positive in level VI and VII. I'm in the LID stage at this time.Take care....
sorry for the typo...(May I ask you at what age you were diagnosed?)
What are your latest labs (including thyroglobulin)?  Have you been tested for diabetes?Utahmomma - papillary carcinoma

question: thyroidectomy 1995 with papillary/follicular cancers. now 60 lb wt gain and unable to loose no matter what I do
title: thyroidectomy 13 yrs. cancer/ 60 lb wt gain
